entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.4.22
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 633e51369731903d566349e3cb548f5576821069 feature: (#568) Separator allowed in usergroup line for trusted headers (#572)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.4.22

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.4.22

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.5.26
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • c20eea29cde8460ff90dd8d6a3f713ee2af21b6c feat: win unicode flag (#590)
  • 8c073bf45fca6c6eda4e8a9feb182433277343ee feature: Intelligent version comparison #575 (#580)

Bug fixes

  • 0a7f3f32263e880ca2841957962988ce28e8b9f8 bugfix: #503 Fix possible race condition in onfileindir* (#576)

Others

  • b83b7a4c427bd3268fa61ddc216b88621bdf2bf6 build(deps-dev): bump base-x from 3.0.9 to 3.0.11 in /webui.dev (#577)
  • fcfa007ceca48888518a2ff97e47bc00478e2dc2 build: Add unit tests for regex (ref: #578)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.5.26

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.5.26

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.6.1
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 74f0930dccc8d9273b95f596a8a229a40d3099e3 feat: #582 ServiceMain for Windows (#593)
  • b2e7509959d4c486ab51c38f14906cca204730d8 feat: use sans-serif font everywhere (#597)

Others

  • cebab3251412d3ba5b83b2294696c14471e4af09 bug: Hide password values in deeplinks #594 (#596)
  • 7110399d413d200243a80aa4e000fa36e3b33916 fix: Bug that caused duplicate links (eg Diagnostics and Logs) in the nav bar (#595)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.6.1

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2025.6.1

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.6.6
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 224d7f40ed4699d1061de6d83208c49a3f852b0a feat: Add unauthenticated readyz endpoint (#600)

Others

  • 18c559970473374cfa7e27eff62f05f3acf3931c fix: Datetime mangling for Android phones #564 (#602)
  • 1357eae9b8928055491f3acdd6816c844056c220 fix: Empty dashboards are hidden (#599)
  • 1ffdd93ddf4a1e8fdb7652274ad86a805a0dbc4e fix: Redact password arguments in logs #594 (#601)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.6.6

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2025.6.22
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 1970311ff5e3bcf26ab832ddfb009a9b119cc4e6 feat: Triggered actions get previous action args #607 (#611)

Others

  • 433456986dc7a0e738e33c2790126a3df2716e58 fix: #603 - Dashboards that have fieldsets without entities are hidden (#609)
  • e38361f3d7550f511364fcc9bff4ab5693b7cff9 fix: gofmt/gocylo leftover from old PR (#610)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2025.6.22
